goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 456kB)
graph_title: Average proportion of Freshwater and Terrestrial Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas
indicator_name: Proportion of important sites for terrestrial and freshwater biodiversity that are covered by protected areas, by ecosystem type
target_name: 2020년까지, 국제 협약 의무에 따라, 특히 산림, 습지, 산, 건조지 등의 육지 및 내륙 담수 생태계와 그 서비스에 대한 보전, 복원 및 지속가능한 사용을 보장
page_content: ▶ Data type: Estimated data by international organizations (Type2) This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling. If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
title: Proportion of important sites for terrestrial and freshwater biodiversity that are covered by protected areas, by ecosystem type
national_indicator_description: Proportion of important sites that are covered by protected areas as defined by the International Union for Conservation of Nature(IUCN)
target: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements
